name: Seed Magic
description:
Seed Magic is a Match-3 game about the magic of the potential contained in seeds, containing forests and fields and life.

You are The Gardner, responsible for maintaining the Jungle where magic flora and fauna thrive, but something is wrong. A corruption has been spreading through the Jungle, affecting both the beasts and the greenery alike. You must purge the corruption and save them!

Combine seeds to extra their magics to cure the corruption from the Jungle animals you find. But, be careful, the corruption has already affected the seeds themselves! Corrupt seeds will unleash a madness on the animals, driving them to attack you. The healing and protective properties of the Green and Yellow seeds will help you stay safe on your journey.
